metaDescriptions.index: Student portfolio landing page: about me, skills, projects, education, experience, and contacts.
metaDescriptions.contacts: Page with Illia's full contact information.

about.title: About Me
about.text: I enjoy A24 movies, shooting film photography, riding a bicycle, and programming in data science. I am most interested in combining analytical thinking with visually clean web interfaces.

projectsSection.title: Projects
projectsSection.noscript: Enable JavaScript in your browser to display the dynamic project list.

experience.title: Experience
practiceItems: Built webpage structures for internal projects.
Prepared content and edited HTML templates.
Worked with Git in a team of 4 students.
volunteerItems: Built a landing page for a charity fair event.

items.title: Student Events Poster Site
items.description: A single-page site with a program, speakers, and registration block.
items.details: Focus: clean layout, structured content, section navigation, and small interactions (buttons/links).

items.title: Online CV
items.description: A personal resume website focused on structure and readability.
items.details: Focus: logical sections, typography, responsiveness. In this practical task, JS is used for filtering/search and theme switching.

items.title: Todo List
items.description: A mini app for task management with basic JavaScript logic.
items.details: Focus: state, events, and list rendering. This version demonstrates an array + DOM approach.

items.title: Mini Photo Gallery
items.description: A page with image cards and simple filtering.
items.details: Focus: rendering from data, event delegation, dataset usage, and basic UI states.

items.title: Course Notes
items.description: A small reference page with course topics and examples.
items.details: Focus: structuring information, micro-interactions, and a neat interface without frameworks.
